summary: Subway is an American fast-food franchise known for its subs and wraps. It started in 1965 in Connecticut as Pete's Super Submarines and later became Subway in 1972. The company quickly expanded through franchising, becoming the world's fastest-growing franchise in 2015. Today, Subway has over 37,000 restaurants in more than 100 countries, making it the largest single-brand restaurant chain globally. Its headquarters are in Shelton, Connecticut, and it's famous for its "Eat Fresh" slogan, emphasizing fresh ingredients.
title: Subway (restaurant)
